kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=foodie, url=http://localhost:5001, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:5001/api/v1/restaurants path_url=/api/v1/restaurants headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '23'} body=b'{"name": "Robot Hotel"}'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:5001/api/v1/restaurants status=201, reason=CREATED headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.1.5 Python/3.11.9', 'Date': 'Mon, 16 Feb 2026 07:23:46 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '169', 'Connection': 'close'} body={ "approved": false, "category": "", "contact": "", "enabled": true, "id": "873fd025-0f8b-4560-82c8-3c619b749f31", "location": "", "name": "Robot Hotel" }
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
